title: Business & Finance
text:
FTC staffers have begun looking into disclosures that Facebook 's internal company research had identified ill effects from its products.

---

Hertz said that it is linking up with Uber to make 50,000 Teslas available in Uber's ride-sharing network by 2023.

---

GM and Ford reported steep drops in profit for the third quarter as the computer-chip shortage dented factory output.

---

The Justice Department is scrutinizing Visa 's relationships with large financial-technology companies as part of its antitrust investigation of the card giant.

---

Boeing posted a quarterly loss as 787 Dreamliner production problems and its latest space-launch setback offset a recovery in demand for new aircraft.

---

The S&P 500 and Dow fell 0.5% and 0.7%, respectively, while the Nasdaq ended little changed.

---

Samsung Electronics reported record quarterly revenue and saw net profit grow by 31% on the back of booming demand for memory chips.

---

U.S. orders for durable goods decreased in September for the first time since spring.

---

Email-security software maker Mimecast is exploring a possible sale.
